dt: {bc}a wind instrument consisting of a conical or cylindrical usually metal tube, a cup-shaped mouthpiece, and a flared bell
{bc}a valved brass instrument having a cylindrical tube with two turns and a usual range from F sharp below middle C upward for 2¹/₂ octaves
{bc}a musical instrument (such as a cornet) resembling a trumpet
{bc}something that resembles a trumpet or its tonal quality: such as
{bc}a funnel-shaped instrument (such as a megaphone) for collecting, directing, or intensifying sound

et: Middle English {it}trompette{/it}, from Anglo-French, from {it}trumpe{/it} trump
shortdef: a wind instrument consisting of a conical or cylindrical usually metal tube, a cup-shaped mouthpiece, and a flared bell; specifically : a valved brass instrument having a cylindrical tube with two turns and a usual range from F sharp below middle C upward for 21/2 octaves
a musical instrument (such as a cornet) resembling a trumpet

dt: {bc}to make a sound suggestive of that of a trumpet
{bc}to sound or proclaim on or as if on a trumpet

shortdef: to make a sound suggestive of that of a trumpet
to sound or proclaim on or as if on a trumpet

dt: {bc}any of various plants (such as a trumpet vine or a datura) with trumpet-shaped flowers

shortdef: any of various plants (such as a trumpet vine or a datura) with trumpet-shaped flowers
the flower of a trumpet flower

dt: {bc}a North American honeysuckle ({it}Lonicera sempervirens{/it}) with whorls of large coral-red or orange flowers having a narrow trumpet-shaped corolla

shortdef: a North American honeysuckle (Lonicera sempervirens) with whorls of large coral-red or orange flowers having a narrow trumpet-shaped corolla

dt: {bc}a North American woody vine ({it}Campsis radicans{/it}) of the bignonia family having pinnate leaves and large typically red trumpet-shaped flowers

shortdef: a North American woody vine (Campsis radicans) of the bignonia family having pinnate leaves and large typically red trumpet-shaped flowers

dt: {bc}to talk about oneself or one's achievements especially in a way that shows that one is proud or too proud

dt.t: He had a very successful year and has every right to {it}blow his own trumpet{/it}.

shortdef: to talk about oneself or one's achievements especially in a way that shows that one is proud or too proud
